attributes.action: Open all religious buildings/shopping malls  to homeless people for night time
attributes.background:
Ever morning I see a number of people sleeping on the streets while all religious institutions and shopping malls kept empty during night time. 

I believe opening these type of building to homeless people ( at least at night) can prevent homeless people developing serious health issues.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be an decision for individual churches and shopping centres. You could start a petition calling on the Government to fund more homeless shelters.
